block.p: American League BOSTON RED SOX--Activated RHP Ramon Martinez from the 15-day disabled list. KANSAS CITY ROYALS--Activated 2B Carlos Febles from the 15-day disabled list. NEW YORK YANKEES--Recalled RHP Jay Tessmer from Columbus of the International League. OAKLAND ATHLETICS--Called up LHP Todd Belitz from Sacramento of the PCL. SEATTLE MARINERS--Activated OF Jay Buhner from the 15-day disabled list.

American League BOSTON RED SOX--Activated RHP Ramon Martinez from the 15-day disabled list. KANSAS CITY ROYALS--Activated 2B Carlos Febles from the 15-day disabled list. NEW YORK YANKEES--Recalled RHP Jay Tessmer from Columbus of the International League. OAKLAND ATHLETICS--Called up LHP Todd Belitz from Sacramento of the PCL. SEATTLE MARINERS--Activated OF Jay Buhner from the 15-day disabled list.
Appalachian League BURLINGTON INDIANS--Announced C Denny Lantigua has been promoted to Kinston of the Carolina League.
Atlantic League NASHUA PRIDE--Released RHP Craig Mattson.
National Football League DENVER BRONCOS--Re-signed WR Andre Cooper.
United Hockey League ADIRONDACK ICEHAWKS--Signed D Marc Busenburg.
